infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Core+ needs camera access to scan food items and analyze their nutritional content using AI-powered food recognition technology.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Core+ needs photo library access to save scanned food images and allow you to select photos from your gallery for nutritional analysis.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Core+ needs to read your health data to provide personalized fitness tracking, nutrition insights, and workout recommendations tailored to your health profile.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Core+ needs to write health data to log your workouts, meals, and fitness activities to your Health app, keeping all your wellness data synchronized.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: Core+ uses motion data to track your steps and physical activity automatically, providing accurate fitness insights without manual logging.
